section: Exercise 3.13.1: Proofs by strong induction - combining stamps.
instructions: Prove each of the following statements using strong induction.
question:
(a)

Prove that any amount of postage worth 8 cents or more can be made from 3-cent or 5-cent stamps.
answer: k + 1. Therefore, it is possible to make k + 1 cents worth of postage using only 3-cent and 5-cent stamps. ■
